cpu.title: CPU
cpu.description: The amount of compute allocated to the Cloud Run Job. (1000m = 1 CPU). See https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/configuring/cpu#setting-jobs.

env.title: Environment Variables
env.description: Environment variables to set when starting a flow run.

image.title: Image Name
image.description: The image to use for a new Cloud Run Job. If not set, the latest Prefect image will be used. See https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/deploying#images.

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: The amount of memory allocated to the Cloud Run Job. Must be specified in units of 'G', 'Gi', 'M', or 'Mi'. See https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/configuring/memory-limits#setting.

region.title: Region
region.description: The region where the Cloud Run Job resides.

command.title: Command
command.description: The command to use when starting a flow run. In most cases, this should be left blank and the command will be automatically generated.

timeout.title: Job Timeout
timeout.description: The length of time that Prefect will wait for Cloud Run Job state changes.

keep_job.title: Keep Job After Completion
keep_job.description: Keep the completed Cloud Run Job after it has run.

credentials.title: GCP Credentials

$ref.block_document_id: YOUR_GCP_CRED_ID - Set this up in the Prefect Cloud UI

credentials.description: The GCP Credentials used to initiate the Cloud Run Job. `service_account_info` is required.

vpc_connector_name.title: VPC Connector Name
vpc_connector_name.description: The name of the VPC connector to use for the Cloud Run Job.

service_account_name.title: Service Account Name
service_account_name.description: The name of the service account to use for the task execution of Cloud Run Job. By default Cloud Run jobs run as the default Compute Engine Service Account.

GcpCredentials.title: GcpCredentials

project.title: Project
project.description: The GCP project to use for the client.

service_account_file.title: Service Account File
service_account_file.description: Path to the service account JSON keyfile.

service_account_info.title: Service Account Info
service_account_info.description: The contents of the keyfile as a dict.

GcpCredentials.description:
Block used to manage authentication with GCP. Google authentication is handled via the `google.oauth2.
See Google's [Authentication documentation](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication#service-accounts)
for details on inference and recommended authentication patterns.

variables.description:
Default variables for the Cloud Run Push Pool.

The schema for this class is used to populate the `variables` section of the default
base job template.
